
Class "Utils" not found (View: /Applications/MAMP/htdocs/schools/resources/views/layouts/onboarding-layout.blade.php)
AutoFormat.RemoveSpansWithoutAttributes
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 4.0.1
DEFAULT: false
--DESCRIPTION--
<p>
  This directive causes <code>span</code> tags without any attributes
  to be removed. It will also remove spans that had all attributes
  removed during processing.
</p>
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
